parameters.info: Custom parset file (note: all paths in the parset must be relative to the mount points inside the container). Advance usage only.
parameters.name: parset

parameters.info: number of CPUs to use (0 or 1 disables parallelism)
parameters.name: ncpu

parameters.info: minimum number of chunks to load into memory at once
parameters.name: min-chunks

parameters.info: log memory use
parameters.name: memory

parameters.info: disable progress bars and other pretty console output
parameters.name: boring

parameters.info: append to log file if it exists (default truncates)
parameters.name: append

parameters.info: column to read weights from
parameters.name: column

parameters.info:
seed random number generator with explicit seed, if given. Useful for reproducibility
of the random-based optimizations (sparsification, etc.).
parameters.name: random-seed

parameters.info: parset version number, for migration purposes. Can't be specified on command line.
parameters.name: parset-version

parameters.info: Solve in single or double precision
parameters.name: precision

parameters.info: Type of Jones matrix to solve for
parameters.name: jones-type

parameters.info: amplitude clipping: flag solutions with diagonal amplitudes below this value.
parameters.name: clip-low

parameters.info: amplitude clipping: flag solutions with any amplitudes above this value.
parameters.name: clip-high

parameters.info: amplitude clipping begins after this number of iterations.
parameters.name: clip-after-iter

parameters.info:
Re-estimate chi^2 and noise at the end of a solution cycle. Disabling last rites can save a
bit of time, but makes the post-solution stats less informative.
parameters.name: last-rites

parameters.info: insert BITFLAG column if missing, and initialize named flagset from FLAG/FLAG_ROW
parameters.name: auto-init

parameters.info: save flags to named flagset in BITFLAG. If none or 0, doesn't save
parameters.name: save

parameters.info: if true, reninitializes BITFLAG column from scratch. Useful if you ended up with a dead one.
parameters.name: reinit-bitflags

parameters.info: Output verbosity level.
parameters.name: verbose

parameters.info: Jumps into pdb on error.
parameters.name: pdb

parameters.info: predict model visibilities from given LSM (using Montblanc).
parameters.name: lsm

parameters.info: read additional model visibilities from given MS column.
parameters.name: column

parameters.info: use DDEs (--Model-LSM must be set).
parameters.name: ddes

parameters.info: FIELD_ID to read.
parameters.name: field

parameters.info:
DATA_DESC_IDs to read. Default reads all. Can be specified as e.g. "5",
"5,6,7", ""5~7" (inclusive range), "5:8" (exclusive range), "5:" (from 5 to last).
parameters.name: ddid

parameters.info: additional TaQL selection string
parameters.name: taql

parameters.info: MS name
parameters.name: ms

parameters.info: MS column to read for data
parameters.name: column

parameters.info: If True, then time chunks will be broken up by change in SCAN_NUMBER.
parameters.name: chunk-on-scans

parameters.info: Base name of output files.
parameters.name: name

parameters.info: Save what visibilities to MS.
parameters.name: vis

parameters.info: Output MS column name for --Output-Vis.
parameters.name: column

parameters.info: Generate summary plots.
parameters.name: plots

parameters.info: Show summary plots interactively.
parameters.name: plots-show
